entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
